name: A Mobster’s Journey
description:
You are an up and coming mobster, and your goal is to rise the ranks in the gang. Use your epic parkour skills to jump across the dangerous obstacles in your way.

Use W to jump, A and D to move sideways, and R to reload if you get stuck. Use your environment to your advantage to change your rotation, and avoid the spikes! Your character isn’t able to wall jump using his head or feet, or off of boxes, so be careful!
